org.jmisb.api.video

Class VideoSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmisb.api.video.VideoSystem
  • Deprecated. 
    Use the Video IO classes constructors directly

    public class VideoSystem
extends Object
    Central class used to instantiate all streams.

    When possible, it is recommended that try-with-resources blocks be used when creating instances using any of the create* methods of this class to ensure that the instance's close() method will be called and its resources released. For example, 

    
 try (IVideoFileInput input = VideoSystem.createInputFile())
 {
     input.open("file.ts");
     // ... do something with input
 }
 catch (IOException ex)
 {
     // handle file open failure
 }
